articles.title: Layered subsurface in Utopia Basin of Mars revealed by Zhurong rover radar - Nature.com
articles.description: A ground-penetrating radar survey of Martian subsurface structure in a southern marginal area of Utopia Planitia constructed a detailed subsurface image profile showing a roughly 70-m-thick, multi-layered structure below regolith.
